title: How do I change it back to normal rift?
body:
The new snowdown map is no doubt amazing but for people with colour blind like me, I can barely see the skills and particles now that everything blue.
Is there a way to change it back to the normal rift as I can barely see the skillshots, let alone dodge them.

replies.body:
There is an automated message telling you how to turn off snowdown effects every fucking game.

Pay attention.

Put the crack pipe down.

There should be an option (in the graphics/video menu, I believe) that will allow you to turn the map accents off. If it's true to other recent uses of accents, there should be a chat message at the start of the match that tells you how to disable the map accent.
Not to mention there IS a colour blind mode.

I don't believe colour blind mode changes the map skin at all, so the contrast could well be an issue. I play in colour blind mode just cause I like the health bars and the map itself doesn't seem any different from what I can tell.
